article: One day a pig went to the stable to  see  a good friend, an old horse, and was going to  _  there for the night . Night came and it was time  _  sleep. The pig went into the straw heap and lay comfortably . A long time  passed  , but the horse was still  _  there and did not move. So the pig asked the horse  _  he did not go to sleep. "Standing like this is the beginning of sleeping." answered the  _  .The pig found it  _  to believe and said, "How can you stand there sleeping? It is not comfortable at all." The horse answered, "Comfort is your habit .  _  horses, we have the habit of running quickly. So we are always ready to run quickly even if we are  asleep  .
